title: someone hack my count and cahnge email
body:
SO...... some one hacked my count   

I try to change my password but email was difftent my legue email is <redacted>
my legue of legend count and Gmail count password is same but I changed my Gmail password.
I cant change my legue of legend password because email is not mine. it was this Email 
<redacted>
I think I got this and   get hacked======== yo guys Riots giving out chanmpionship riven <redacted>

pleas help me....I am really scared hack person gonna change my password riot pleas help me.. pleas

replies.body: i have the same problem but i cant remember most of the questions they ask. im not going to sit here while an account that i've spent years on gets ruined and i will make sure to hold riot accountable for the rp that was wasted. i avoid links because of being hacked and yet someone still got in and changed my email

Hey there,

I've gone ahead and removed any personal information from your post, also the phishing link. In the future refrain from posting these links on the boards as some players may mistakenly click them and log in, thus also falling victim to these attacks.

Anyway, onto your account. You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and begin the account recovery process, we here on the boards are unable to assist in this matter.
